title: First Anniversary Sale!
content:
It’s hard to believe that we started Postliberal Order exactly one year ago today — November 6th, 2021 — we had no idea how it would take off, but it has thanks to you!

To celebrate, we’re offering 30% off our annual subscription rate. That works out to only $49 for the year, or $4 per month for discourse-defining essays you’ll not find anywhere else.

Whether you are a free or a paid subscriber, we’re ultimately grateful to you, dear reader, for making Postliberal Order into a destination for all those who believe that another order is not only possible, but who believe it’s being envisioned right here and now in these pages.

Upgrade your free subscription, or give a gift subscription, or just encourage your friends to read and support Postliberal Order.
